gov.nih.nlm.ling.transform

Class AdverbialTransformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.transform.AdverbialTransformation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DependencyTransformation

    public class AdverbialTransformation
extends java.lang.Object
implements DependencyTransformation
    A DependencyTransformation implementation that transforms a Sentence object by making explicit the semantic dependencies involving adverbial clauses. This transformation is mostly useful for discourse processing. The prerequisite is DependencyDirectionReversal transformation.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Method Detail

      • getPrerequisites

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends DependencyTransformation>> getPrerequisites()
        Description copied from interface: DependencyTransformation
        Gets the dependency transformation rules that should have been applied before applying the current one.

        This is because the current rule assumes a dependency configuration generated by the prerequisite rule.

        Specified by:
        getPrerequisites in interface DependencyTransformation
        Returns:
        the prerequisite dependency transformation rules, or empty list if no prerequisites

      • transform

        public void transform(Sentence sent)
        Transforms a sentence by addressing the adverbial clauses and phrases. Simply calls #transformAdvClause(Sentence) and #transformAdvPhrase(Sentence).
        Specified by:
        transform in interface DependencyTransformation
        Parameters:
        sent - the sentence to transform
